nodes.text: The Dimok were the ruling body of the planet of Dimok. They were constantly at war with Ripoblus, until the Galactic Empire intervened.
The Dimok possessed a small navy that was likely exhausted by their continued fighting towards the Ripoblus.

Their fighters included BTL Y-wing starfighters, Z-95 Headhunters, and Lambda-class shuttles. starfighter squadrons included Baker Squadron, Larkma Squadron, Bordok Squadron, Elba Squadron, Givin Squadron, and Adam Squadron to name just a few. Many of their ships were converted merchant craft modified for military duty, such as Cargo ferries and Modified corvettes. For capitol ships, they used light Mon Calamari cruisers such as Ben Het and Falcariae. They also had space station called the Science Station Youst defended by Z-95 Headhunters and Delta-class JV-7 escort shuttles.

Notably During the war, the Dimok's once tried to stop a Ripoblus convoy claiming that they were seizing illegal war supplies. These war supplies included Imperial munitions, which could not be acquired legitimately. Ironically enough, the Secret Order of the Emperor suspected that they were armed by an Imperial, as an Order member noted that their facilities were not capable of producing craft they were using. Their suspicions proved to be the case as Dimok ships were soon discovered to be carrying Imperial munitions and supplies.
